sentences.en: He set up shop as a retail tobacconist in the High Street.
sentences.cn: 他在哈艾大街开业做烟草零售商.

sentences.en: I used to work at a tobacconist's, and I found it quite interesting.
sentences.cn: 从前我在一家纸烟店工作, 我对那里的工作很感兴趣.

sentences.en: There's a tobacconist's on the corner.

trans.tran_cn: 烟草商，烟草制品零售店
trans.tran_en: someone who has a shop that sells tobacco, cigarettes etc
